[lcd]
section_name="st7701s_fwvga_dd_f06s","ili9806e_fwvga_dsi_vdo_ivo_dd";

[st7701s_fwvga_dd_f06s_hsd]
#LCM_TYPE_DBI = 0
#LCM_TYPE_DPI = 1
#LCM_TYPE_DSI = 2
type = 2;

width = 480;
height = 960;

#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_DISABLED = 0,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_ONLY = 1,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_OR_HSYNC = 2,
te_mode = 0;

#	LCM_POLARITY_RISING = 0,
#	LCM_POLARITY_FALLING = 1
te_edge_polarity= 0;

#	CMD_MODE = 0,
#	SYNC_PULSE_VDO_MODE = 1,
#	SYNC_EVENT_VDO_MODE = 2,
#	BURST_VDO_MODE = 3
mode = 3;

#	LCM_ONE_LANE = 1,
#	LCM_TWO_LANE = 2,
#	LCM_THREE_LANE = 3,
#	LCM_FOUR_LANE = 4,
lane_num= 2;

#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_RGB = 0,
#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_BGR = 1
color_order = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_MSB_FIRST = 0,
#   LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_LSB_FIRST = 1
trans_seq = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_LSB = 0,
#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_MSB = 1
padding = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB565 = 0,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB666 = 1,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB888 = 2
format  = 2;

packet_size=256;

#	LCM_PACKED_PS_16BIT_RGB565 = 0,
#	LCM_LOOSELY_PS_18BIT_RGB666 = 1,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_24BIT_RGB888 = 2,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_18BIT_RGB666 = 3

ps=2;
vertical_sync_active= 2;
vertical_backporch= 20;
vertical_frontporch= 18;
horizontal_sync_active= 10;
horizontal_backporch= 100;
horizontal_frontporch= 10;

pll_clock = 180;

ssc_disable= 1;

name = "st7701s_fwvga_dd_f06s_hsd";

read_id_mask=0;


read_id = 0xa000,100,\
0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,30,\
0x9100,4,0x00,0x02,0x37,0x00,\
0xb100,2,0xa1,2;

lcm_id = 0x8802;

#gpio_id_pin=1,1,2000;

init = 0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0x9200,0x11,1,0x00   ,\    
0xa000,150,\   
0x9200,0xFF,  5,0x77, 0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x10,\
0x9200,0xC0,  2,0x77, 0x00,\
0x9200,0xC1,  2,0x0E, 0x02,\
0x9200,0xC2,  2,0x31, 0x02,\
0x9200,0xB0,  16,0x00, 0x03, 0x0C, 0x0C, 0x14, 0x09, 0x04, 0x09, 0x08, 0x1C, 0x08, 0x14, 0x10, 0x1D, 0x11,0x18,\
0x9200,0xB1,  16,0x00, 0x01, 0x0A, 0x0A, 0x12, 0x07, 0x04, 0x09, 0x08, 0x1C, 0x08, 0x17, 0x15, 0x15, 0x1B, 0x18,\
0x9200,0xFF,  5,0x77, 0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x11,\
0x9200,0xB0,  1,0x4D,\
0x9200,0xB1,  1,0x4C,\
0x9200,0xB2,  1,0x07,\
0x9200,0xB3,  1,0x80,\
0x9200,0xB5,  1,0x47,\
0x9200,0xB7,  1,0x8A,\
0x9200,0xB8,  1,0x21,\
0x9200,0xC0,  1,0x07,\
0x9200,0xC1,  1,0x78,\
0x9200,0xC2,  1,0x78,\
0x9200,0xD0,  1,0x88,\
0x9200,0xE0,  3,0x00, 0x00, 0x02,\
0x9200,0xE1,  11,0x07, 0x8C, 0x09, 0x8C, 0x06, 0x8C, 0x08, 0x8C, 0x00, 0x44, 0x44,\
0x9200,0xE2,  12,0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,\
0x9200,0xE3,  4,0x00, 0x00, 0x33, 0x33,\
0x9200,0xE4,  2,0x44, 0x44,\
0x9200,0xE5,  16,0x0F, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x11, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x0B, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x0D, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C,\
0x9200,0xE6,  4,0x00, 0x00, 0x33, 0x33,\
0x9200,0xE7,  2,0x44, 0x44,\
0x9200,0xE8,  16,0x0E, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x10, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x0A, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C, 0x0C, 0xCA, 0x8C, 0x8C,\
0x9200,0xEB,  2,0x02, 0x00,\
0x9200,0xED,  16,0xAB, 0x89, 0x76, 0x54, 0x01, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x10, 0x45, 0x67, 0x98, 0xBA,\
0x9200,0xFF,  5,0x77, 0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,\
0x9200,0x29,1,0x00,\
0xa000,30;



enter_sleep = 0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0x9200,0x28, 1,0x00,\
0xa000,20, \
0x9200,0x10, 1,0x00,\
0xa000,120;

#exist_sleep =0x9200,0x11,1,0x00,\
#0xa000,150,\
#0x9200,0x29,1,0x00,\
#0xa000,50;

[st7701s_fwvga_dd_f06s]
#LCM_TYPE_DBI = 0
#LCM_TYPE_DPI = 1
#LCM_TYPE_DSI = 2
type = 2;

width = 480;
height = 960;

#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_DISABLED = 0,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_ONLY = 1,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_OR_HSYNC = 2,
te_mode = 0;

#	LCM_POLARITY_RISING = 0,
#	LCM_POLARITY_FALLING = 1
te_edge_polarity= 0;

#	CMD_MODE = 0,
#	SYNC_PULSE_VDO_MODE = 1,
#	SYNC_EVENT_VDO_MODE = 2,
#	BURST_VDO_MODE = 3
mode = 3;

#	LCM_ONE_LANE = 1,
#	LCM_TWO_LANE = 2,
#	LCM_THREE_LANE = 3,
#	LCM_FOUR_LANE = 4,
lane_num= 2;

#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_RGB = 0,
#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_BGR = 1
color_order = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_MSB_FIRST = 0,
#   LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_LSB_FIRST = 1
trans_seq = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_LSB = 0,
#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_MSB = 1
padding = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB565 = 0,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB666 = 1,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB888 = 2
format  = 2;

packet_size=256;

#	LCM_PACKED_PS_16BIT_RGB565 = 0,
#	LCM_LOOSELY_PS_18BIT_RGB666 = 1,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_24BIT_RGB888 = 2,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_18BIT_RGB666 = 3

ps=2;
vertical_sync_active= 2;
vertical_backporch= 20;
vertical_frontporch= 18;
horizontal_sync_active= 10;
horizontal_backporch= 100;
horizontal_frontporch= 10;

pll_clock = 180;

ssc_disable= 1;

name = "st7701s_fwvga_dd_f06s";

read_id_mask=0;

read_id = 0xa000,100,\
0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,30,\
0x9100,4,0x00,0x02,0x37,0x00,\
0xb100,2,0xa1,2;

lcm_id = 0x8802;

#gpio_id_pin=1,1,1000;

init = 0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0x9200,0x11,1,0x00   ,\    
0xa000,150,\   
0x9200,0xFF,5,0x77,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x10,\
0x9200,0xC0,2,0x77,0x00,\
0x9200,0xC1,2,0x0E,0x0C,\
0x9200,0xC2,2,0x07,0x03,\
0x9200,0xCC,1,0x10,\
0x9200,0xB0,16,0x40,0x02,0x8D,0x11,0x17,0x0A,0x08,0x09,0x09,0x1B,0x07,0x16,0x12,0x0E,0x15,0x19,\
0x9200,0xB1,16,0x40,0x02,0x8D,0x11,0x16,0x09,0x08,0x08,0x08,0x1F,0x07,0x15,0x12,0x91,0x15,0x19,\
0x9200,0xFF,5,0x77,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x11,\
0x9200,0xB0,1,0x4D,\
0x9200,0xB1,1,0x4D,\
0x9200,0xB2,1,0x80,\
0x9200,0xB3,1,0x80,\
0x9200,0xB5,1,0x40,\
0x9200,0xB7,1,0x8A,\
0x9200,0xB8,1,0x23,\
0x9200,0xB9,2,0x00,0x13,\
0x9200,0xC0,1,0x09,\
0x9200,0xC1,1,0x78,\
0x9200,0xC2,1,0x78,\
0x9200,0xD0,1,0x88,\
0x9200,0xE0,3,0x00,0xA0,0x02,\
0x9200,0xE1,11,0x06,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x05,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x20,0x20,\
0x9200,0xE2,13,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x03,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,\
0x9200,0xE3,4,0x00,0x00,0x33,0x33,\
0x9200,0xE4,2,0x44,0x44,\
0x9200,0xE5,16,0x09,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x0B,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x05,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x07,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,\
0x9200,0xE6,4,0x00,0x00,0x33,0x33,\
0x9200,0xE7,2,0x44,0x44,\
0x9200,0xE8,16,0x08,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x0A,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x04,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,0x06,0xD4,0xAA,0x8C,\
0x9200,0xEA,16,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,0x10,0x00,\
0x9200,0xEB,7,0x02,0x02,0x4E,0x4E,0x44,0x00,0x10,\
0x9200,0xEC,2,0x02,0x01,\
0x9200,0xED,16,0x05,0x47,0x61,0xFF,0x8F,0x9F,0xFF,0xFF,0xFF,0xFF,0xF9,0xF8,0xFF,0x16,0x74,0x50,\
0x9200,0xFF,5,0x77,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,\
0x9200,0x29,1,0x00,\
0xa000,30;



enter_sleep = 0xd000,1,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0x9200,0x28, 1,0x00,\
0xa000,20, \
0x9200,0x10, 1,0x00,\
0xa000,120;

#exist_sleep =0x9200,0x11,1,0x00,\
#0xa000,150,\
#0x9200,0x29,1,0x00,\
#0xa000,50;





[ili9806e_fwvga_dsi_vdo_ivo_dd]
#LCM_TYPE_DBI=0
#LCM_TYPE_DPI=1
#LCM_TYPE_DSI=2
type=2;

width=480;
height=960;

#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_DISABLED=0,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_ONLY=1,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_OR_HSYNC=2,
te_mode=0;

#	LCM_POLARITY_RISING=0,
#	LCM_POLARITY_FALLING=1
te_edge_polarity=0;

#	CMD_MODE=0,
#	SYNC_PULSE_VDO_MODE=1,
#	SYNC_EVENT_VDO_MODE=2,
#	BURST_VDO_MODE=3
mode=1;

#	LCM_ONE_LANE=1,
#	LCM_TWO_LANE=2,
#	LCM_THREE_LANE=3,
#	LCM_FOUR_LANE=4,
lane_num=2;

#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_RGB=0,
#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_BGR=1
color_order=0;

#	LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_MSB_FIRST=0,
#LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_LSB_FIRST=1
trans_seq=0;

#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_LSB=0,
#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_MSB=1
padding=0;

#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB565=0,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB666=1,
#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB888=2
format=2;

packet_size=256;

#	LCM_PACKED_PS_16BIT_RGB565=0,
#	LCM_LOOSELY_PS_18BIT_RGB666=1,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_24BIT_RGB888=2,
#	LCM_PACKED_PS_18BIT_RGB666=3

ps=2;
vertical_sync_active=2;  #10
vertical_backporch=12;  #20
vertical_frontporch=8;      #20
horizontal_sync_active=20;   #20
horizontal_backporch=20;     #60  40
horizontal_frontporch=30;    #60  40

need_esd_check=1,0x0a,1,0x9c;
pll_clock=192;              #225  192

ssc_disable=1;

name="ili9806e_fwvga_dsi_vdo_ivo_dd";
#read_id_mask =0, means id=(buff[0]<<8)|buff[1]
#read_id_mask =1, means id=(buff[2]<<8)|buff[3]
#read_id_mask =2, means id=(buff[0]<<8)|buff2[0] (buff[0]  read from a registor like 0x04,0xc4...,buff2[0] read from  the other registor  like 0x05,0xc5...  according to the  IC)
#read_id_mask =3, means id=(buff[1]<<8)|buff2[1] (buff[1]  read from a registor like 0x04,0xc4...,buff2[1] read from  the other registor  like 0x05,0xc5...  according to the  IC)
#if 'A=4' means all IC id can be combo,usage: if 'A=4' means using this mode,'B' means how many regitors need to be read it can be  1 or 2, 
#'C' means the number of the first registor data we need, 'D' means the number of the second registor data we need if 'B=2' or the second number data of the first regitsor if 'B=1'

#read_id_mask=A,B,C,D;
read_id_mask=4,2,0,0;
#gpio_id_pin used for same IC combo
#gpio_id_pin=GPIO number,1 or 0;

#gpio_power used for ?5V power enable(some FHD LCM need)
#gpio_power=GPIO number,GPIO number;
read_id=0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,120,\
0x9100,12,0x00,0x06,0x39,0x02,0x06,0x98,0xff,0xff,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x04,\
0xa000,10,\
0x9100,4,0x00,0x03,0x37,0x00,\
0xb100,2,0x00,1,\
0xb100,2,0x01,1;

lcm_id=0x9806;

#gpio_id_pin used for same IC combo
#gpio_id_pin=GPIO number,1 or 0;

#gpio_power used for ?5V power enable(some FHD LCM need)
#gpio_power=GPIO number,GPIO number;

init=0xd000,1,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,0,\
0xa000,10,\
0xd000,1,\
0xa000,120,\
0x9200,0xFF,5,0xFF,0x98,0x06,0x04,0x01,\
0x9200,0x08,1,0x10 ,\
0x9200,0x21,1,0x01 ,\
0x9200,0x30,1,0x07 ,\         
0x9200,0x2E,1,0x77 ,\         
0x9200,0x31,1,0x02 ,\         
0x9200,0x40,1,0x15 ,\
0x9200,0x41,1,0x55 ,\
0x9200,0x42,1,0x03 ,\
0x9200,0x43,1,0x09 ,\
0x9200,0x44,1,0x06 ,\
0x9200,0x50,1,0x78 ,\         
0x9200,0x51,1,0x78 ,\         
0x9200,0x53,1,0x6a ,\         
0x9200,0x55,1,0x6b ,\         
0x9200,0x57,1,0x50 ,\         
0x9200,0x60,1,0x07 ,\
0x9200,0x61,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0x62,1,0x08 ,\
0x9200,0x63,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0xA0,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0xA1,1,0x05 ,\
0x9200,0xA2,1,0x0F ,\
0x9200,0xA3,1,0x10 ,\
0x9200,0xA4,1,0x0A ,\
0x9200,0xA5,1,0x1C ,\
0x9200,0xA6,1,0x0A ,\
0x9200,0xA7,1,0x0A ,\
0x9200,0xA8,1,0x01 ,\
0x9200,0xA9,1,0x09 ,\
0x9200,0xAA,1,0x04 ,\
0x9200,0xAB,1,0x03 ,\
0x9200,0xAC,1,0x10 ,\
0x9200,0xAD,1,0x33 ,\
0x9200,0xAE,1,0x2F ,\
0x9200,0xAF,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0xC0,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0xC1,1,0x02 ,\
0x9200,0xC2,1,0x0B ,\
0x9200,0xC3,1,0x11 ,\
0x9200,0xC4,1,0x0A ,\
0x9200,0xC5,1,0x18 ,\
0x9200,0xC6,1,0x08 ,\
0x9200,0xC7,1,0x06 ,\
0x9200,0xC8,1,0x06 ,\
0x9200,0xC9,1,0x0B ,\
0x9200,0xCA,1,0x06 ,\
0x9200,0xCB,1,0x07 ,\
0x9200,0xCC,1,0x0B ,\
0x9200,0xCD,1,0x29 ,\

0x9200,0xCF,1,0x00 ,\
0x9200,0xFF,5,0xFF,0x98,0x06,0x04,0x06,\
0x9200,0x00,1,0x3D,\  
0x9200,0x01,1,0x08,\

0x9200,0x04,1,0x12,\

0xa000,20,\

0xa000,120;

#0xa000,150,\
#0x9200,0x29,1,0x00,\
#0xa000,50;

[tp]
section_name="msg2xxx","ft6x36";


[msg5846]
name="msg58xx";
gestrue_support=1;
max_height=1280;
max_width=720;

[msg22xx]
#需跟tpd_device_name一致
name="msg2xxx";

have_button=1;

have_touch_key=1;
#gpiosetting,settingsasdws
#pinNumber,mode,pull_sel,output,pull_enable,dir,ies_enable,smt_enbale
#'9'isnotset,usedefaultsetting
rst_gpio=82,9,9,9,9,9,9,9;
eint_gpio=5,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
#暂时没加功能
gestrue_support=1;
proximity_support=1;
#暂时没加功能
esd_protect=0;
#以下三个是从汇顶驱动理出来的，FT没用到。
int_trigger=1;
max_height=1280;
max_width=720;
#KEY_HOMEPAGE172
#KEY_BACK158
#KEY_MENU139
#keys=158,172,139;
keys=172,139,158;
button_width=80;
button_height=40;
key_coordinates=600,1300,\
360,1300,\
120,1300;

[ft6x36]
#需跟tpd_device_name一致
name="FT6xxx";

have_button=1;

have_touch_key=1;
#gpiosetting,settingsasdws
#pinNumber,mode,pull_sel,output,pull_enable,dir,ies_enable,smt_enbale
#'9'isnotset,usedefaultsetting
rst_gpio=82,9,9,9,9,9,9,9;
eint_gpio=5,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
#暂时没加功能
gestrue_support=1;
proximity_support=0;
#暂时没加功能
esd_protect=0;
#以下三个是从汇顶驱动理出来的，FT没用到。
int_trigger=1;
max_height=960;
max_width=480;
#KEY_HOMEPAGE172
#KEY_BACK158
#KEY_MENU139
#keys=158,172,139;
keys=139,172,158;
button_width=80;
button_height=40;
key_coordinates=80,900,\
240,900,\
400,900;
[msg22xx]
#需跟tpd_device_name一致
name="msg2xxx";
have_button=1;
have_touch_key=1;
#gpiosetting,settingsasdws
#pinNumber,mode,pull_sel,output,pull_enable,dir,ies_enable,smt_enbale
#'9'isnotset,usedefaultsetting
rst_gpio=82,9,9,9,9,9,9,9;
eint_gpio=5,6,9,9,1,0,9,9;
#暂时没加功能
gestrue_support=0;
proximity_support=0;
#暂时没加功能
esd_protect=0;
#以下三个是从汇顶驱动理出来的，FT没用到。
int_trigger=1;
max_height=1280;
max_width=720;
#KEY_HOMEPAGE172
#KEY_BACK158
#KEY_MENU139
#keys=158,172,139;
keys=158,172,139;

600,1300;

[gslx680]
#需跟tpd_device_name一致
name="gslx680";
have_button=1;
have_touch_key=1;
#gpiosetting,settingsasdws
#pinNumber,mode,pull_sel,output,pull_enable,dir,ies_enable,smt_enbale
#'9'isnotset,usedefaultsetting

eint_gpio=5,6,9,9,1,0,9,9;
#暂时没加功能

proximity_support=0;
#暂时没加功能
esd_protect=0;
#以下三个是从汇顶驱动理出来的，FT没用到。

#KEY_BACK158
#KEY_MENU139

[camera]
section_name ="hi556_mipi_raw","sp2609_mipi_raw";


[hi556_mipi_raw]
#&sp5509
name="hi556mipiraw";
ismain=1;
lens="FM50AF";

#TEKHW_CAMERA_DELAY_MS0xA000
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_RESET0xD000
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_POWERDOWN0xD100
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_IOVDD0xD200
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_AVDD0xD300
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_DVDD0xD400
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_AFVDD0xD500
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_REVERSED_RESET0xD600
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_REVERSED_POWERDOWN0xD700
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_CAMLDO0xD800
poweron=0xD100,0,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD000,0,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD200,18,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD300,28,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD400,12,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD500,28,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD100,1,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD000,1,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD700,0,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD600,0;

poweroff=0xD100,0,\
0xD000,0,\
0xD400,0,\
0xD300,0,\
0xD200,0,\
0xD500,0;

#IMAGE_NORMAL=0,
#IMAGE_H_MIRROR=1,
#IMAGE_V_MIRROR=2,
#IMAGE_HV_MIRROR=3
set_mirror=1;
#SENSOR_OUTPUT_FORMAT_RAW_B=1
#SENSOR_OUTPUT_FORMAT_RAW_B=2
set_color=1;

[sp2609_mipi_raw]
name="sp2609mipiraw";
ismain=0;
lens="Dummy";
#TEKHW_CAMERA_DELAY_MS                   0xA000
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_RESET                  0xD000
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_POWERDOWN              0xD100
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_IOVDD                  0xD200
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_AVDD                   0xD300
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_DVDD                   0xD400
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_AFVDD                  0xD500
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_REVERSED_RESET         0xD600
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_REVERSED_POWERDOWN     0xD700
#TEKHW_CAMERA_SET_CAMLDO                 0xD800
poweron=0xD100,0,\
0xD000,0,\
0xD200,18,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD300,28,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD400,15,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD500,28,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD100,1,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD100,0,\
0xA000,5,\
0xD000,1,\
0xA000,20,\
0xD700,0,\
0xA000,2,\
0xD600,0;

poweroff=0xD100,0,\
0xD000,0,\
0xD400,0,\
0xD300,0,\
0xD200,0,\
0xD500,0;
#IMAGE_NORMAL = 0,
#IMAGE_H_MIRROR = 1,
#IMAGE_V_MIRROR = 2,
#IMAGE_HV_MIRROR =3
set_mirror=3;
set_color=3;

[gsensor]
section_name="mxc400x","bma250_auto","mxc622x_auto","mir3da";

[mxc400x]
name="mxc400x";
i2c_num=2;
direction=3;

[bma250_auto]
name="BMA250";
i2c_num=2;
direction=0;

[mxc622x_auto]
name="MXC622X";
i2c_num=2;
direction=0;

[mir3da]
name="mir3da";
i2c_num=2;
direction=0;

[alsps]
section_name="stk3x1x_auto","epl259x_auto","em3071x_auto";

[stk3x1x_auto]
name="stk3x1x";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high		=150;
ps_threshold_low		=100;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=6,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
#onlyforstk3x1xbegin
stk_max_min_diff=118;
stk_lt_n_ct=35;
stk_ht_n_ct=68;
#onlyforstk3x1xend
[epl259x_auto]
name="epl_sensor";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high		=150;
ps_threshold_low		=100;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=6,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
#onlyforstk3x1xbegin
stk_max_min_diff=	40;
stk_lt_n_ct=30;
stk_ht_n_ct=40;
#onlyforstk3x1xend
[em3071x_auto]
name="em3071x";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high		=150;
ps_threshold_low		=100;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=6,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
#onlyforstk3x1xbegin
stk_max_min_diff=	40;
stk_lt_n_ct=30;
stk_ht_n_ct=40;
#onlyforstk3x1xend

[misc]
section_name="misc_setting";
[misc_setting]
#main flash settings two ways:1.ISINK   A + B a,b ;C a,b;D a,b....+9            2.GPIO    A+B a b;C c  d  +9
#if  A=0  means main flash is isinks(way  1) , B and C is isink number,  'a' means output current(it can be 0,1,2,3,4 means output 0ma,4ma,8ma,16ma,24ma)
#'b' means whether need double if 'b'=1  'a' output current is 0ma,8ma,16ma,32ma,48ma ,"..." means more isinks can be set,'9' means settings end
#if  A=1 means main flash is GPIO (way 2),
#B means gpio number  ,'a' means  torch mode gpio level, 'b' means  flash mode gpio level;C also is gpio number ,'c' means  torch mode gpio level, 'd' means  flash mode gpio level; '9' means settings end(ordinaryly   B and C used for torch and flash)
main_flash=1,8,1,1,34,0,1,9;
#settings as  main flash , gpio only setting one param(such as 15;)
sub_flash=0,0,3,1,1,3,1,2,3,1,9;
#otg_enit=9,6,1,9,1,0,1,0; #not ok now
#charge_enable=0,6,1,9,1,0,1,0;
#key_led=;#not ok now
#volume_key=67,6,1,1,1,0,1,0;
#camera_key;
#home_key=84,6,1,1,1,0,9,9;
gps_lna=65,9,9,9,9,9,9,9;

#tekhw_key=102,3;
